title: Camerawoman Who Was Fired For Kicking Migrants To Sue Facebook
text:
Camerawoman Who Was Fired For Kicking Migrants To Sue Facebook 
NPR Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
This video grab made on early September shows a Hungarian TV camerawoman kicking a child as she runs with other migrants from a police line during disturbances at R?szke, southern Hungary.
